Html:
I've just installed HtmlAgilityPack.1.4.0.beta2It's the first time I've installed the beta version of anything.I opened HtmlAgilityPack.sln in C# 2010 and most of the files failed to convert from 2008. Is HtmlAgilityPack unusable in vs 2010?HtmlAgilityPack.sln converted ok. Is it enough by itself?
THE CONVERSION ATTEMPT:

Solution: HtmlAgilityPack

1 file (HtmlAgilityPack.sln) converted OK

------------------------------------------------------

Project: GetDocLinks VS2008 

3 files. 2 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (GetDocLinks\GetDocLinks VS2008.csproj)

------------------------------------------------------

Project: HAPExplorer

17 files. 16 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (HAPExplorer\HAPExplorer.csproj)

-----------------------------------------------------------

Project: Html2Rss VS2008

4 files. 3 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (Html2Rss\Html2Rss VS2008.csproj)

------------------------------------------------------------

Project: Html2Txt VS2008

5 files. 4 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (Html2Txt\Html2Txt VS2008.csproj)

-----------------------------------------------------------

Project: Html2Xml VS2008

4 files. 3 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (Html2Xml\Html2Xml VS2008.csproj)

-----------------------------------------------------------  

Project: HtmlAgilityPack VS2008 

32 files. 31 failed to convert. Only 1 converted (HtmlAgilityPack\HtmlAgilityPack VS2008.csproj)

Well considering I do all my development in VS2010, I'd say it works. Check the latest source code out of svn, there's a vs2010 solution in there.

Since I finally have a day off (I've had only a handful of weekends free since August..) I'll finally get 1.4.0 stable out today.
